participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, Lila has a vibrant spirit and loves to try new things.
participant_1.background: I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors. I have a timeshare in Mexico. I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix. I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world. I play music in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and family-oriented, Ethan values deep connections with loved ones.
participant_2.background: My three sisters are the most important people in my life. I sometimes forget to walk my dogs, which I know is not good for them. I've been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this. I wear glasses all day. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

content.text: I'm doing alright. What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing music and writing music. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That's great! What kind of music do you play?
I play a variety of instruments, but my main instrument is the guitar. I also play the ukulele, piano, and drums.
That's really cool! I wish I could play an instrument.
You should try it! It's really fun.
What's your favorite thing to do with your family and friends?
We love to go on trips together. We've been to Mexico, the Bahamas, and the Caribbean.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Mexico.
It's a beautiful country. I'm sure you'd love it.
I hope I can go there someday.
